question: A Rs. 50 note with a * (star) in the number panel between the prefix and the serial number indicates that _________?
option1: This note has special security features
option2: This note was printed in a press outside India
option3: This note was printed by RBI to replace a defectively printed banknote
option4: This note is printed on international quality paper
answer: This note was printed by RBI to replace a defectively printed banknote
